title: Blended Collaborative Instructional Design for Strengthening Foundational Mathematics Competencies in Business Administration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic arithmetic operations and simple statistical concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on smartphone-based learning activities, including peer assessment and group task completion among learners.

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in calculating basic statistics (mean, variance, standard deviation) to solve real-life business problems
Learners complete at least three data visualization projects using digital tools in a blended learning environment
Learners successfully perform complex budget allocation simulation tasks with over 90% accuracy through collaborative learning group activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
